00034     private String[] usableTicketNumbers;
00035     private int fewTickets=100;//Used to tell if you need more tickets
00036     private static boolean locked=false;//simple lock to prevent timing issues
00037 /***
00038  * Simple Lock to make sure this and checkNumberOfTicketsandWrite
00039  * don't run at the same time, I think it would simply wait for the other to complete
00040  * @return A unique ticket number or -1 on error
00041  *
00042  */
00043     public int getUniqueTicketNumber(){
00044         try{
00045             while(locked)
00046                     this.wait(1);
00047         }catch(InterruptedException badlock){
00048                 return -1;
00049         }
00050         locked=true;
00051         readCurrentTickets();
00052         checkIfRunningLowOnTickets(1);
00053         writeTicketsFromMemoryMinusHead();
00054         locked=false;
00055         return head();
00056 
00057     }
00063     public boolean checkNumberOfTicketsandWrite(){//version for calling from outside getUniqueTicketNumber when trying to add tickets (if needed while we have a network).
00064         try{
00065             while(locked)
00066                     this.wait(1);
00067         }catch(InterruptedException badlock){
00068                 return false;
00069         }
00070         boolean tempBool=true;
00071         locked=true;
00072         tempBool=checkIfRunningLowOnTickets(0);
00073         locked=false;
00074         return tempBool;
00075 
00076     }
00077     /*
00078      * return true if good-don't need more tickets or got more tickets,false otherwise
00079      */
00080     private boolean checkIfRunningLowOnTickets(int cutoff) {
00081         if (usableTicketNumbers.length< fewTickets)
00082             return checkoutTicketBook(cutoff);
00083         else return true;
00084     }
00088     private void readCurrentTickets() {
00089         try {
00090         FolderCreateIfItDoesntExist("file:///store/home/user/Cite");

00093             {
00094             usableTicketNumbers=readTicketsFromFileReturnStringArray(ticketFile);
00095             ticketFile.delete();

00099         }

00104     private void writeTicketsFromMemoryMinusHead() {
00105         try{

00110             {
00111             ticketfile.delete();

00127     private int head(){

00129             return Integer.parseInt(usableTicketNumbers[0]);
00130         else
00131             return -1;//failure

00139     private String[] readTicketsFromFileReturnStringArray(FileConnection tf) throws IOException {
00140             InputStream readticketFile=tf.openInputStream();
00141 
00142             ByteArrayOutputStream holdBytes=new ByteArrayOutputStream();
00143                 byte arr[]= new byte[1024];
00144                 while(readticketFile.read(arr,0,1024)>0){//need to check how this function works!!!!!
00145                     holdBytes.write(arr,0,1024);
00146                 }
00147 
00148                 String temp[]=ExtraStringUtils.split(holdBytes.toString(),' ');
00149 
00150                 holdBytes.flush();//are both flush and close needed?
00151                 holdBytes.close();
00152                 readticketFile.close();
00153                 return temp;
00154 }
00162     private void WriteStringArrayToFile(String[] strings,FileConnection wfile) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, IOException {

00196     private boolean addTicketsToArray(String[] Ticketbook,int cutoff)
00197     {
00198         if(Ticketbook!=null)
00199             {
00200             String checkout[]={"Stub"};
00201             String temparray[]=new String[checkout.length+usableTicketNumbers.length];
00202             int i,j=0;
00203             for(i=0;i<usableTicketNumbers.length;i++)
00204                 temparray[i]=usableTicketNumbers[i];
00205             for(j=0;j<checkout.length;j++)
00206                 temparray[i+j]=checkout[j];
00207             usableTicketNumbers=temparray;
00208             return true;
00209             }
00210         else
00211             return false;

00219     public void FolderCreateIfItDoesntExist(String FolderPath) throws IOException
00220     {
00221         FileConnection ticketFolder = (FileConnection)Connector.open("FolderPath");
00222         if (!ticketFolder.exists())
00223             ticketFolder.mkdir();
00224         ticketFolder.close();

00226     /*
00227      * Returns null if the file doesn't exist,since you don't need to read an empty file

00229     public FileConnection FileOpenForReading(String FilePath) throws IOException
00230     {
00231 
00232         FileConnection fc=null;
00233         fc = (FileConnection)Connector.open(FilePath);
00234 
00235         if (!fc.exists())
00236             {
00237             fc.close();
00238             return null;
00239             }
00240 
00241         return (FileConnection)Connector.open(FilePath);

00243     }
00244     /*
00245      * Creates file if it doesn't exist, returns null if it can't create it.
00246      */
00247     public FileConnection FileOpenForWriting(String FilePath) throws IOException
00248     {
00249     try{
00250         FileConnection fc=null;
00251         fc = (FileConnection)Connector.open(FilePath);
00252         if (!fc.exists())
00253             {
00254             fc.create();
00255             }
00256         return fc;
00257     }catch(IOException ProblemOpeningFile){
00258         return null;
